name: Vampyr
description: You have grown to become a child of the night. Vampyr is your new name, for you shall not be called death so soon

name: Charming Gaze
description: Your gaze provokes a sense of calm within those whom you adress.

name: Draining Fangs
description: Your canine teeth have elongated and sharpened, allowing for you to feed upon others

attacks.attack_text_u: You tear into %s with your teeth

name: Vampiric Dexterity
description: Your joints seem to have loosened slightly.

name: Enhanced Vampiric Dexterity
description: Your joints seem to have loosened. You may climb obstacles quickly, too.

name: Extreme Vampiric Dexterity
description: Your joints seem to have loosened to a great degree. You may climb obstacles rather quickly, too.
You possess natural night vision, and can see further in the dark than most.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.
You can see incredibly well in the dark!  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.
You can see in pitch blackness as if you were wearing night-vision goggles.  Activate to toggle NV-visible areas on or off.
You lack skin pigmentation due to a genetic problem.  You sunburn extremely easily, and typically use an umbrella and sunglasses when going out in the sun.
Your skin simply cannot handle ultraviolet radiation, such as sunlight.  It will seriously burn you.

name: Bloodshot
description: You have learned to focus your vampiric power into a harmful blast, if fatiguing.

name: Misten Propulsion
description: You have learned to descintegrate into a fine mist, propelling yourself in a general direction, though extremely tiring.

name: Servant Spawn
description: You have learned to focus your vampiric powers to create servants.
